architecture_overview.description: This UI library follows a universal, token-driven architecture. All visual values (colours, typography, spacing, radii, shadows, transitions) are defined as tokens in dedicated files under a tokens folder. Components reference these tokens via CSS variables and never hardcode raw Tailwind classes or static values. A theme system allows overriding the entire design by editing a single file under the /themes directory. Components are fully controlled: they maintain no internal state and expose all data via props. This design ensures the library works in any project, supports multiple themes (default, dark, brand-specific), and maintains complete separation between style tokens and business logic.

global_acceptance_criteria: Changing values in a single theme override file propagates through the entire library without editing component code.
No component contains raw values or direct Tailwind colours; tokens fully control visual appearance.
The library is autonomous and works in any project via ThemeProvider.
Components are stateless and controlled via props only.
